meanings.definition: A small piece or strip cut off of something
meanings.sent1: She found tiny shreds of paper on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The cat tore the toy into shreds.
meanings.sent3: He tried to read the shreds of the torn letter.
meanings.sent4: The wind carried the shreds of the kite far away.
meanings.sent5: The chef sprinkled cheese shreds on the salad.

meanings.definition: A very small amount or fragment of something
meanings.sent1: There were shreds of evidence linking him to the crime.
meanings.sent2: She only had shreds of memory from the party.
meanings.sent3: The detective pieced together the shreds of the torn document.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were shattered into shreds of disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The singer's voice echoed in shreds of emotion.
